mapper.select: select c.*, sh.NAME as s_name, sh.CONTENT as s_content, sh.price2 as s_price, sh.price2*c.c_cnt as c_sumprod from tb_cart c left outer join tb_shop sh on c.c_prodnum=sh.prodnum where c.user_id = #{user_id} order by c_dt desc
mapper.update: update tb_cart set c_cnt=#{c_cnt} where c_no=#{c_no}
mapper.select: select sha.prodnum as prodnum, sha.division as division, sha.uuid as uuid, sha.uploadPath as uploadPath, sha.filename as filename, c.c_prodnum as c_prodnum from sh_appatch sha left outer join tb_cart c on sha.prodnum = c.c_prodnum where sha.division='m' and c.c_prodnum=#{c_prodnum}

select sha.prodnum as prodnum, sha.division as division, sha.uuid as uuid, sha.uploadPath as uploadPath, sha.filename as filename, o.o_prodnum as o_prodnum from sh_appatch sha left outer join tb_orderlist o on sha.prodnum = o.o_prodnum where sha.division='m' and o.o_prodnum=#{o_prodnum}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_orderlist(o_prodnum, o_cnt, o_sum, user_id, o_type) values(#{c_prodnum}, #{c_cnt}, #{c_sumprod}, #{user_id}, 'order')
mapper.select:
select orderlist.*, date_format(orderlist.o_dt, '%m/%d') as o_date, sh.NAME as s_name, sh.CONTENT as s_content, sh.price2 as s_price from ( select @rownum:= @rownum+1 rownum, o.* from tb_orderlist o, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp
where user_id=#{user_id} and o_type='order'
order by o_no desc ) as orderlist left outer join tb_shop sh on orderlist.o_prodnum = sh.prodnum
where rownum >(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum <= #{pageNum}*#{amount}
select count(*) from tb_orderlist where user_id=#{user_id} and o_type='order'

select o.*, date_format(o_dt, '%m/%d') as o_date, sh.NAME as s_name, sh.CONTENT as s_content, sh.price2 as s_price from tb_orderlist o left outer join tb_shop sh on o.o_prodnum = sh.prodnum where o.user_id = #{user_id} and o_no=#{o_no}

select orderlist.*, date_format(orderlist.o_mod_dt, '%m/%d') as o_mod_date, sh.NAME as s_name, sh.CONTENT as s_content, sh.price2 as s_price from ( select @rownum:= @rownum+1 rownum, o.* from tb_orderlist o, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp
where user_id=#{user_id} and o_type='cancle'
order by o_mod_dt desc ) as orderlist left outer join tb_shop sh on orderlist.o_prodnum = sh.prodnum
